title: Nuclear medicine imaging monitors effectiveness of therapy for melanoma patients

title_detail.value: Nuclear medicine imaging monitors effectiveness of therapy for melanoma patients

summary: Nuclear medicine imaging with PET/CT can monitor the effectiveness of immunotherapy treatment for metastatic melanoma and predict outcome. In this way, a patient's therapy can be more effectively tailored to his or her personal response.
